alert.note: Alert for Covington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 3:56AM CDT until June 26 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Covington County in south central Alabama... Okaloosa County in northwestern Florida... Eastern Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... Southeastern Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 500 AM CDT. * At 356 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles west of Laurel Hill to 7 miles northwest of Baker to Roeville to 5 miles northeast of Oriole Beach, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wright, Fort Walton Beach, Crestview, Niceville, Destin, Eglin AFB, Milton, Valparaiso, Mary Esther, Bagdad, Ocean City, Lake Lorraine, Baker, Oriole Beach, Navarre, Shalimar, Laurel Hill, Cinco Bayou, Point Baker and Navarre Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
